mapper.select: select a.auditor_id as 'auditorId', count(*) as 'auditCount' from audit join auditor a on audit.auditor_id = a.auditor_id where a.auditor_type = 0 group by a.auditor_id
select audit.* from audit join auditor a on audit.auditor_id = a.auditor_id where a.user_id = #{userId}

select a.auditor_id as 'auditorId', count(*) as 'auditCount' from audit join auditor a on audit.auditor_id = a.auditor_id where a.auditor_type = 0 and a.auditor_id = #{auditorId} group by a.auditor_id

select application_id as 'applicationId', count(*) as 'applicationCount' from audit join auditor a on audit.auditor_id = a.auditor_id where a.auditor_type = 0 and application_id = #{applicationId} group by audit.application_id
select count(*) from audit where application_id=#{applicationId} and audit_status=2 group by application_id
select count(*) from audit where application_id = #{applicationId} and audit_status = 3 group by application_id
